text: David Antônio Corrêa (June 5, 1937 – May 10, 2020) was a Brazilian singer- songwriter. His works were Samba, Samba-enredo and Pagode. He was born in São João de Meriti, Rio de Janeiro. His career began in 1972. He created many songs and background music for Rio de Janeiro carnival. In April 2020, Corrêa was run over by a car in Rio de Janeiro. He died on May 10, 2020 of kidney failure caused by COVID-19, aged 82. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Rio de Janeiro Category:Deaths from renal failure Category:Brazilian singer- songwriters Category:Writers from Rio de Janeiro Category:Singers from Rio de Janeiro
title: David Corrêa
